pages.text: Item Cards are used to send items between inventories, such as chests and furnaces.$(br2)Overclocker values are documented on the following page.

Items/t values (max) for Overclockers:$(br2)$(li)0 Overclockers: 8 Items/20t$(li)1 Overclocker: 16 Items/16t$(li)2 Overclockers: 32 Items/12t$(li)3 Overclockers: 48 Items/8t$(li)4 Overclockers: 64 Items/4t
